---
title: "Safepaw-opt Documentation"
---

SAFEPAW-opt is an optimization  platform developed within the [SAFEPAW](https://lifat.univ-tours.fr/lifat-english-version/projects/recent/root/2023-2027-safepaw-societal-assets-for-e-healthcare-patient-pathways) 
project designed to support healthcare territorial planning.
